note: I belong to LOC in J&K. I am a dentist currently pursuing MDS. I am a keen observer of political trends & am a small time analyst of current events. I hate politics of hate. I despise arrogance and ostentation of the corrupt, super rich and the powerful. I believe criminals should face fast track trials and should face punishment at the earliest. I think politicians should have a maximum tenure of 10 years. I believe no individual should have wealth above 10 crores & no family above 50 crores.
